finalescape.mapcomponent

Class ProjectileComponent

  • java.lang.Object
    • finalescape.mapcomponent.MapComponent
      • finalescape.mapcomponent.ProjectileComponent
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    BoomerangProjectile, FrisbeeProjectile, PacketProjectile

    public abstract class ProjectileComponent
extends MapComponent
    A MapComponent for projectiles, with some basic functionality. Projectiles move in a specific Direction until they hit something solid. Then they, destroy both the solid MapComponent, and themselves. These properties can be overridden. All projectiles have corresponding Items, which have been ProjectileItems historically.
    Author:
    Ofek Gila
    See Also:
    MapComponent, FrisbeeProjectile, BoomerangProjectile, PacketProjectile, ProjectileItem
